segments.text: Can I order something from the kitchen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just tell me what you'd like , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare would hit the spot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hate to tell you this , but we have no more filet mignon . May I suggest the porterhouse instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure ! Right now , I would even eat hamburger !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever tried chocolate-covered strawberries with champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but I just finished eating some chocolate-covered cherries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'll be a bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and porterhouse , all charged to your amenities account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please call if you have any other requests . Your food will be delivered promptly .
segments.speaker: S2
